i am recently divorced.
i think i have talent for it.
people say i talk when i m not supposed to.

content.text: Hey, it's going well, thanks! I'm looking forward to the weekend.
Me too! I'm going to spend it at home with my alpacas. I love them so much.
Aww, that sounds so cute! I've never seen an alpaca in real life.
You should! They're so fluffy and friendly.
Maybe I will one day. I'm recently divorced and looking for a new hobby.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. But I'm sure you'll find a great new hobby!
Thanks! I'm thinking about getting into music. I used to play the guitar, but I haven't in a long time.
That's a great idea! I love music. I play the piano and I sing.
That's so cool! I wish I could sing.
You should try! It's really fun.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the encouragement.
No problem! Have a great day!
